summary: A malevolent rock star kidnaps a singer to force her to participate in the summoning of a demon, and her band must help her stop him.
cast: Don Francks|Greg Salata|Susan Roman|Samantha Langevin|Dan Hennessey|Greg Duffell|Chris Wiggins|Brent Titcomb|Donny Burns|Martin Lavut|Catherine Gallant|Keith Hampshire|Melleny Melody|Anna Bourque|Nick Nichols|John Halfpenny|Maurice LaMarche|Catherine O'Hara|Debbie Harry|Paul Le Mat|Iggy Pop|Lou Reed|Robin Zander
director: Director: Clive Smith (as Clive A. Smith)
title: Rock & Rule
